::Hot Rod::

Hot Rod hears Devestator's transformation yell, and the machine gun
fire.
"Prime, we better go help. Sounds like more Preds have arrived."
Hot Rod grabs his fully charged plasma gun, and a stock pile of rockets.
"Time to give another Pred a lesson!"
Hot Rod runs out to the battle.
